mapper.select: select id userId, nickname, avatar from member_user where deleted = 0 and id in (${playUserIds})

select m.id, m.nickname, m.avatar, REPLACE(m.mobile, SUBSTRING(m.mobile, 4, 4), '****') mobile, ifnull((select sum(su.balance) from member_store_user su left join member_store_info s ON s.store_id=su.store_id where su.deleted = 0 and s.deleted = 0 and su.user_id = m.id),0) balance, ifnull((select sum(su.gift_balance) from member_store_user su left join member_store_info s ON s.store_id=su.store_id where su.deleted = 0 and s.deleted = 0 and su.user_id = m.id),0) giftBalance, (select count(1) from member_order_info where deleted = 0 and user_id = m.id and status in (0, 1, 2)) orderCount, (select create_time from member_order_info where deleted = 0 and user_id = m.id and status in (0, 1, 2) order by create_time desc limit 1 ) orderTime,m.create_time createTime from member_user m where m.deleted=0
and ( locate(#{reqVO.name},m.nickname)>0 OR locate(#{reqVO.name},m.mobile)>0 )
order by ${reqVO.cloumnName} ${reqVO.sortRule}
order by m.create_time desc
select nickname from member_user where deleted=0 and id=#{userId}
